meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lea Tottle Sam Spaulding Sid Chandrasekhar Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6023.

td.p: Lea Tottle, a junior from Florida State University from Oldsmar, Florida
Sam Spaulding, a sophomore from Yale University from Wilmington, North Carolina
Sid Chandrasekhar, a senior from the University of Pennsylvania from Saratoga, California

tr.td: THE 15th CENTURY
THE QUOTABLE STEVE CARELL
JELLY BELLY FLAVORS
CLASSICAL MUSIC
NEXT IN THE SERIES
MEET ME IN THE "QUAD"

tr.td: Sid

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Lea] Did you risk and lose a lot? All but a dollar, and that makes Sam a finalist with $10,801. Come on over, Sam. Congratulations, young man.)
(Sam: Thank you.)
(Alex: Here\'s who you\'re going up against tomorrow and Friday.)
(Erin: Erin McLean--Boston University.)
(Hans: Hans von Walter--Southern Adventist University.)
(Alex: Two sophomores in the finals. Join us tomorrow when the finals begin. So long, everybody.)
SidWhat is the end of the road?
$3,600
SamWhat is fin de siecle?
$6,399
LeaWhat is a pit stop
$17,599
turning point')

Sam
Lea

Finalist
3rd place: $10,000

Sam
Lea
